response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is valued at $10,000 by you, which makes it a perfect fit for your needs. Considering the high value it holds for both of us, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant savings compared to the market value. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 9500}
